original_title: Le fabuleux destin de Elisabeth Vigée Le Brun, peintre de Marie-Antoinette
overview: A renowned painter and a free-thinker, Elisabeth Louise Vigée Le Brun is still considered ahead of her time. Follow the artist's adventures over the course of her nearly 90-year life in this captivating docudrama.
title: The Fabulous Life Of Elisabeth Vigee Labrun
